SQL.LOAD: SELECT description, code, service_network_id, created_by, created_date, modified_by, modified_date, route_id FROM elp_route WHERE route_id = :route_id
SQL.LOAD_LIST: SELECT rt.route_id, rt.description, rt.code short_desc, snw.short_desc service_network_code FROM elp_route rt, elp_service_network snw WHERE snw.company_group_id = :company_group_id and rt.route_id like :route_id and rt.service_network_id like :service_network_id and rt.service_network_id = snw.service_network_id --dynamic_in_clause ORDER BY UPPER(description)
SQL.LOAD_AVAILABLE_SERVICE_CENTER_LIST: select sc.service_center_id id, sc.description, sc.code from elp_service_center sc, elp_service_network_svc snsc where snsc.service_center_id = sc.service_center_id and snsc.service_network_id = :service_network_id and sc.route_id is null order by upper(description)
SQL.LOAD_SELECTED_SERVICE_CENTER_LIST: select sc.service_center_id id, sc.description, sc.code from elp_service_center sc where sc.route_id = :route_id order by upper(description)
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_route SET description = :description, code = :code, service_network_id = :service_network_id, modified_by = :modified_by WHERE route_id = :route_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elp_route ( description, code, service_network_id, created_by, route_id ) VALUES ( :description, :code, :service_network_id, :created_by, :route_id )
SQL.LOAD_LIST_DYNAMIC: SELECT route_id, description, code FROM elp_route WHERE service_network_id = :service_network_id
SQL.GET_ROUTE_BY_CODE: select route.route_id, route.code, route.description, route.service_network_id from elp_route route join elp_service_network sn on route.service_network_id = sn.service_network_id where sn.company_group_id = :company_group_id and route.code = :code
